title: Highland Rebel
description: SHE WAS A PROUD HIGHLAND BEAUTY FIGHTING FOR HER LAND AND HER PEOPLE ...Lovely Catriona Galbraith belonged to the lush rolling hills and misty valleys of the Isle of Skye. But now her homeland and heritage were being threatened by the very man who had sired her ... Rory MacDonald, the tyrannical laird whose greed would finally drive her people from their rightful land ... unless she found some way to stop him.HE WAS THE BOLD AMERICAN SWORN TO WIN HER LOVE ...Handsome Texas rancher Ian MacLeod had come to Scotland to bury his beloved grandfather. He never meant to stay. Yet the moment he laid eyes on Cat, he knew he had found his true heart's desire. This bewitching young woman filled him with a longing that tasted both pleasure and pain. But Ian didn't know the dangerous secret that beckoned Cat out night after night: a secret that could sow the seeds of revolution --- and destroy a passion greater than either had ever known before.
author: Stephanie Bartlett
